text: Former first lady Barbara Bush died Tuesday at 92, and people on both sides of the aisle took time to fondly remember her and her legacy, and how she shaped her family. Jenna Bush Hager, a Today show anchor and daughter of President George W. Bush, posted a heartbreaking statement on Instagram to remember her grandmother. Bush Hager said her grandmother was “ the glue that held our family together, ” and that she constantly was stopped by people wanting to praise the former first lady. “ She adored my Gampy, the first man she ever kissed, ” Bush Hager wrote. “ Their love story is so engrained in the history of our family. ” Read her full caption below : “ I already miss this FORCE of a woman — the ‘ enforcer ’ because she
